title: ICE "Mismatched open/close delims" with `derive` and multiple syntax errors

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Found with a [modified fuzz-rustc](https://github.com/jruderman/fuzz-rustc)

### Code

```rust
#[derive(A)]
struct S {
    d: [u32; {
        #![cfg] {
            #![w,)
```

### ICE

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `Bracket`,
 right: `Brace`: Mismatched open/close delims: open=Bracket close=pe.rs:5:19: 5:19 (#0)', compiler/rustc_parse/src/parser/attr_wrapper.rs:410:17
```

<details><summary>Full output including backtrace</summary>

```
error: this file contains an unclosed delimiter
 --> pe.rs:5:19
  |
2 | struct S {
  |          - unclosed delimiter
3 |     d: [u32; {
  |        -     - unclosed delimiter
  |        |
  |        unclosed delimiter
4 |         #![cfg] {
  |                 - unclosed delimiter
5 |             #![w,)
  |                   ^

error: expected one of `(`, `::`, `=`, `[`, `]`, or `{`, found `,`
 --> pe.rs:5:15
  |
5 |             #![w,)
  |               ^ ^ help: `]` may belong here
  |               |
  |               unclosed delimiter

error: expected expression, found `,`
 --> pe.rs:5:17
  |
5 |             #![w,)
  |                 ^ expected expression

error: expected one of `(`, `::`, `=`, `[`, `]`, or `{`, found `,`
 --> pe.rs:5:17
  |
5 |             #![w,)
  |                 ^ expected one of `(`, `::`, `=`, `[`, `]`, or `{`

error: expected one of `.`, `?`, `]`, or an operator, found `}`
 --> pe.rs:5:19
  |
2 | struct S {
  |        - while parsing this struct
...
5 |             #![w,)
  |                   ^ expected one of `.`, `?`, `]`, or an operator

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `Bracket`,
 right: `Brace`: Mismatched open/close delims: open=Bracket close=pe.rs:5:19: 5:19 (#0)', compiler/rustc_parse/src/parser/attr_wrapper.rs:410:17

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (e75aab045 2022-11-09) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

query stack during panic:
end of query stack
error: aborting due to 5 previous errors
```

</details>

### Regression

Possibly a regression in nightly-2021-04-12, perhaps from #84023.

It's hard to tell with such a cursed testcase.

### Version

```
rustc 1.67.0-nightly (e75aab045 2022-11-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: e75aab045fc476f176a58c408f6b06f0e275c6e1
commit-date: 2022-11-09
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.67.0-nightly
LLVM version: 15.0.4
```
